Romain Grosjean has showed his hands finally free of bandages, six weeks after he climbed from the wreckage of his car in an horrific fireball accident at the Bahrain Grand Prix.

articles.title: Olympic gold medalist Klete Keller and anti-COVID vax doctor Simone Gold stormed Capitol with mob - Daily Mail
articles.description: A three-time Olympian swimmer was identified on Tuesday among the Capitol rioters last week - spotted for his 6'6" height and Team USA jacket. Anti COVID vaxxer Simone Gold was also there.
articles.content: A gold medal-winning Olympic swimmer and an infamous California doctor who protested against lockdowns and demonizes vaccines was among the mob that stormed the Capitol on Wednesday, it has emerged.… [+7553 chars]
